DOC.brief_summary: More 1 million people worldwide wear soft contact lenses refractive error correction . However , severe sight threaten complication due contact lens wear contact lens-related microbial keratitis ( CLMK ) 1 per 2500 person per year . The rate infection increase drastically 1 per 500 person per year lenses worn overnight . Recently , color tint cosmetic soft contact lens , essentially soft contact lenses color tint annular ring , gain increase popularity especially among young Asian population desire change iris color doll-eyed look . However , study effect lenses ocular surface scarce . Recently , report 12 case lens-related microbial keratitis due wear color tint lens report . Others report decreased contrast sensitivity , increase high order aberration , temporary change corneal topography due color tint lens wear . Nevertheless , comprehensive prospective study yet do . Thus , purpose study conduct prospective observational study determine influence color tint cosmetic contact lens wear visual performance ocular surface alteration .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Cosmetic Color Tinted Contact Lenses Ocular Surface
DOC.detailed_description: 3 . Methods All subject require fill basic information take survey questionnaire contact lens wear . Subjects examine test fitted color tint contact lens slit-lamp biomicroscopy fluorescein stain ( Heig Strait , Germany ) , intraocular pressure measurement pneumotonometery ( Topcon® CT-80 ) , refractometer ( Topcon® KR-8900 ) , uncorrected best correct Snellen visual acuity ( UCVA BCVA ) , Schirmir test 1 , tear film break-up time ( TBUT ) , corneal topography ( Bausch & Lomb® Orb IIz ) , endothelial cell density measurement specular microscopy ( Konan Noncon Robo-Sp-9000 , USA ) . Exams also perform 1 week , 1 , 3 , 6 month lens wear . A special chart subject fill visit During exam , subject observed sign conjunctival injection , conjunctival papillary hypertrophy , pannus formation , corneal epitheliopathy . These sign grade show table . Signs 0=Normal 1=Mild 2=Moderate 3=Severe Conjunctival Injection None Minimal Obvious Diffuse Papillae Size None < 0.25mm 0.25-0.5mm > 0.5mm Superficial Pannus No pannus 1 quadrant 2 quadrant > =3 quadrant Punctate Epitheliopathy None < 1/3 cornea 1/3-1/2 cornea Confluent epithelial defect Schirmir test 1 ( basal secretion test ) perform 5 minute consider abnormal filter strip wet < 5 mm length . TBUT le 10 second consider abnormal . Impression cytology perform lens wear 3 6 month post lens wear National Taiwan University . Nitrocellulose filter paper pore size 0.22 μm ( Millipore GSWP 04700 , Billerica , MA , U.S.A. ) cut strip ( 4x8 mm ) . After drop topical anesthetic ( proparacaine 0.5 % ) application , excess tear gently absorb sterile cotton swab . Nitrocellulose strip place surface limbal conjunctiva . After apply light pressure , paper strip peel immediately fix 95 % alcohol . The strip stain use periodic acid-Schiff ( PAS ; Sigma 395132 , Hattiesburg , MS , USA ) examine light microscopy 40X magnification grade mask observer follow Saini et al 's criteria21 follow . Grade 1 : Small round epithelial cell nucleus cytoplasm ration 1:2 . Large number deeply positive cell present . A good confluent sheet cell usually obtain . Grade2 : A good cell sheet consist large polygonal epithelial cell decrease nucleocytoplasmic ration 1:3 . Goblet cell reduce number , still deeply PAS-positive . Grade 3 : Larger polygonal cell decrease nucleus cytoplasm ratio . Reduced number goblet cell , reduce staining . Grade 4 : Larger polygonal basophilic cell pyknotic nucleus . Intracellular keratin often demonstrable . Absent goblet cell . Only loose clump obtainable . Goblet cell density also grade counting average number cell per 100 epithelial cell least four high power field ( HPF ) . Grade 1 : > 30 goblet cells/ 4 HPF . Grade 2 : 15-30 goblet cells/ 4 HPF . Grade 3 : 5-15 goblet cells/ 4 HPF . Grade 4 : < 5 goblet cells/ 4 HPF . In vivo confocal microscopy image cornea perform lens wear 3 6 month post lens wear one mask examiner subject National Taiwan University . One drop 0.5 % proparacaine solution artificial tear instill immediately exam . After ask patient look straight ahead , vivo confocal microscope ( Confoscan 3.4.1 ; Nidek Technologies , Padova , Italy ) equip standard 40x water-immersion front lens captured image full thickness central cornea automatically . Each examination take approximately 1 3 minute record 350 image distance 1.5 4 μm z-axis successive image . During visit , measurement repeat 4 um z-interval 3 time follow 1.5 um z-interval 3 time . Analysis epithelial cell morphology , epithelial thickness , stromal reaction follow publish Chen et al22-24 . Corneal nerve morphology density also record analyze . Used contact lenses place provide storage case bring back check completeness lens tear chipped piece . The lens use material analysis scan electromicroscopy ( SEM ) bacterial adhesion determination personal funding . For SEM , use lens fix half strength Karnovskys fixative ( 2 % paraformaldehyde 2.5 % glutaraldehyde ) gentle wash . The fixative removed distil water add rinsing . Rapid freeze liquid nitrogen immersion do place vacuum overnight . The concave side sample mount aluminum stub sputter-coated gold examination SEM ( JEOL Ltd , JSM 5300 , Japan ) 15kV various magnification . For bacterial adhesion determination , use lens collect sterile plate gently dip three time PBS placement eppendorf tube contain 1ml PBS . The lens macerate serial dilution 105 do plat onto Muller-Hinton agar . The agar plate incubate overnight colony form unit count next day . Number colony multiply dilution factor divide volume plat give CFU/ml/per contact lens . All data enter Excel spreadsheet ( Microsoft , Inc ) analyze use SPSS software Windows ( 11.0 , SPSS , Inc. ) . Paired t-tests use compare parameter wear color tint contact lens .
DOC.criteria: Age 2035 year old myopia le 6.00 D , Astigmatism le 1.50 D previous soft contact lens wear discontinue least 2 week subject previous Rigid Gas Permeable wear Any ocular surgery topical medication dry eye syndrome glaucoma ocular trauma pregnancy corneal disorder dystrophy
